## Developing

1. Make changes in terraform files

2. Regenerate documentation

    ```bash
    bash <(git archive --remote=git@gitlab.com:miquido/terraform/terraform-readme-update.git master update.sh | tar -xO)
    ```

3. Run lint

    ```
    make lint
    ```
